product_name: Lezyne Alloy Digital Drive Floor Pump
long_description: Equipped with a very accurate digital gauge that's easy to read, the Lezyne Alloy Digital Drive Floor Drive pump optimizes tire pressure with great looks and durable CNC-machined construction. High-polish, CNC-machined aluminum barrel and base combine with the steel piston and varnished wood handle for easy, high-pressure pumping power. 43 in. extra-long rubber hose makes it easy to inflate tires, even if your bike is still on the stand. Flip-Thread chuck threads directly onto Presta or Schrader valves for a secure, air-tight connection. Air bleed system cleverly eliminates chance of accidentally unthreading a removable Presta valve; also lets you adjust tire pressure when inflating via Schrader valves. Lezyne Alloy Floor Drive pump has a maximum inflation pressure of 220 psi (15 bars).
short_description: Equipped with a very accurate digital gauge that's easy to read, the Lezyne Alloy Digital Drive Floor Drive pump optimizes tire pressure with great looks and durable CNC-machined construction.
